title: Brave and Bold Vandal Women
paragraph: Join us for an opening reception March 1st, 11:30am - 1:00pm on the library's 2nd floor to celebrate 50 years of U of I Women Center and Title IX.

image-alt: I-tower frost from UI Media Photoshelter
title: Welcome to the Library!
paragraph: The library is here to help with all your research needs. And we have novels, DVDs, and board games!

title: Chat help is available 24/7!
paragraph: Don't know where to start on that assignment? Get research help from a librarian 24 hours a day via chat!

title: Explore Black History at U of I
paragraph: The Black History Research Lab and Library are pleased to release the second volume of the Black History at the University of Idaho project

image-alt: hands gesturing in workshop by Headway on unsplash
title: The Data Hub
paragraph: The Data Hub is a new space providing support in Geospatial and Data Sciences. Help is available 11am - 3pm, Mon - Fri.

title: What Does Your Library Look Like?
paragraph: Explore our new My Library stories highlighting students and little-known library services.
